statements: DELETE FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE room_id = 10 AND temperature < 20;
DELETE FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND room_id = 101
DELETE FROM smart_home_sensors_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 70
DELETE FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_name = 'Decision Tree';
DELETE FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_models WHERE accuracy < 0.95 OR last_trained < '2021-12-01';
DELETE FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND measurement_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM smart_home_sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Living Room Temperature Sensor';
